title: So... about those Kindred buffs.
body:
I'm happy such a weak champion (for pretty much anyone without a ridiculous amount of experience on her) that I love an incredible amount is getting minor buffs which should help her do somewhat better.
But I'm sort of surprised not one single thread crying about "hurdur wtf rito y u return kindoord to pre-nerf" or something of that nature.
With how riled up people got about Kindred (which was justified since she was incredibly strong pre-nerfs, although the nerfs thereafter were excessive), I thought there'd be more complaining about even the slightest Kindred buffs.

replies.body:
I majorly disliked Kindred before due to her massive early strength on a champion that is supposed to be someone who heavily scales into the late-game.

These buffs do not look to reignite these issues. In fact, I'd say that Riot is finally satisfied with the level of her early strength (clear speed, clear healthiness, early game damage to champions) and now looks to put power back into her in a way to fulfill her overall fantasy. And these buffs look (to me, at least) good on that front - more AD growth factor is only a major boon in the later stages (remember, base stats grow in a nonlinear fashion), and %-based damage is also only a major factor in the mid-to-late game.

The issue is she's literally worthless in lategame except as an ult-bot unless she gets her Hunts.
And to get said Hunts, she needs a somewhat stronger early so she can actually get them without just suffering at being unable to even clear her own jungle that well let alone invade or kill others.
But yeah.

I honestly don't think 30 additional damage to her level 3 combo is going to matter.  

The only real significance to this buff is that her clear speed is increased by . . . roughly 2 seconds. Which boils down to a single auto attack.

It's still a buff no matter how minor, which she needs.
It's a start at the very least.

Well meanwhile better keep aatrox in the shit tier cause scrubs don't buy executioner's calling, morellobook, ninja Tabi, thornmail, frozen heart nor randiuns omen. I'm still happy no one is bitching about kindred getting buffed, w00t.

I think the heal would be fine if it was just a lot smaller in amount.
